body_html:
Can't you achieve the same result by doing the following in the definition of Print:

 if v.dtype._is_ref:
  with ops.control_dependencies([Print(constant_op.constant(1), data)]):
    return gen_array_ops._ref_identity(v._ref)

?
body:
Can't you achieve the same result by doing the following in the definition of Print:

```
 if v.dtype._is_ref:
  with ops.control_dependencies([Print(constant_op.constant(1), data)]):
    return gen_array_ops._ref_identity(v._ref)
```
?
